param.name: description
param.value: A general-purpose analysis workflow for whole-genome or targeted resequencing with homozygous SNP and indel calling. Reads are filtered by length and quality, mapped to a provided reference sequence, and consensus and variants are identified versus this reference using the Quiver algorithm.

module.label: SFilter v1
module.description: This module filters reads based on a minimum subread length, polymerase read quality and polymerase read length.

param.name: minSubReadLength
param.label: Minimum Subread Length
param.title: The minimum subread length. Shorter subreads will be filtered and excluded from further analysis.

rule.message: Value must be a positive integer

param.name: readScore
param.label: Minimum Polymerase Read Quality
param.title: The minimum polymerase read quality determines the quality cutoff. Polymerase reads with lower quality will be filtered and excluded from further analysis.

param.name: minLength
param.label: Minimum Polymerase Read Length
param.title: The minimum polymerase read length. Shorter polymerase reads will be filtered and excluded from further analysis.

rule.message: Value must be a positive integer

module.label: BLASR v1
module.description: BLASR maps reads to genomes by finding the highest scoring local alignment or set of local alignments between the read and the genome. The first set of alignments is found by querying an index of the reference genome, and then refining until only high scoring alignments are retained. Additional pulse metrics are loaded into the resulting cmp.h5 file to enable downstream use of the Quiver algorithm.

param.name: maxHits
param.label: Maximum number of hits per read
param.title: The maximum number of matches of each read to the reference sequence that will be evaluated. maxHits should be greater than the expected number of repeats if you want to spread hits out on the genome.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 1000

param.name: maxDivergence
param.label: Maximum divergence (%)
param.title: The maximum allowed divergence of a read from the reference sequence.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 100

param.name: minAnchorSize
param.label: Minimum anchor size
param.title: The minimum anchor size defines the length of the read that must match against the reference sequence.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 8 and 30

param.name: samBam
param.label: Write output as a BAM file

param.name: loadPulsesOpts
param.title: The default option of loadPulses is 'byread'. Option 'bymetric' is desined to sacrifice memory for increased speed, especially for jobs of which the number of reference contigs is large.

module.label: Quiver v1
module.description: Quiver identifies haploid SNPs and indels by performing a local realignment of reads using the full range of sequence quality metrics.

param.name: outputConsensus
param.label: Output consensus FASTA and FASTQ files
param.title: Output consensus FASTA and FASTQ files

param.name: enableMapQVFilter
param.label: Use only unambiguously mapped reads
param.title: Filter out reads with Map QV less than 10. Coverage in repeat regions shorter than the read length will be reduced.
